categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Viatar was a Human male captain of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was stationed at the Jagged Plains Imperial Garrison on Hoth, an outpost about to be brought from down below by a team of Republic sappers digging beneath it. Viatar's response team was slaughtered by the native wampas, so he had to recruit an Imperial hero to deal with the problem properly.
